TopicTitle: Why KSP is not updating anymore?

Articles.Content: Why developers don't working for new updates? im waiting the version 0.24 xD
I think they are. Also, you'll probably get a lot of hate from people by posting that. If you check the Daily Kerbal, you can see they're working on the ARM update.
Yes, if you want to know what's going on in terms of updates, check KSP's Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, the forums or even KSP-TV

PrometeoPrime, they are working on it

Give them time, and don't worry.

Closing this one.
